definition: to fill/to satisfy/to fulfill/to act in place of/substitute/sufficient/full
lit. to allay one's hunger using a picture of a cake/to feed on illusions (idiom)
to allay one's hunger and slake one's thirst (idiom)
to bury one's head in the sand (idiom)

sentences.english: Running our of grain, the army had to live on wild fruit and tree bark.
sentences.chinese: 部队断了粮，只能靠野果和树皮充饥。

sentences.english: We had to eat some potatoes substituted as a meal.
sentences.chinese: 我们只得吃了几个马铃薯充饥。

sentences.english: So for days and days she had nothing but bread and butter and tea.
sentences.chinese: 所以好多天来她只有黄油面包和和茶来充饥。

sentences.english: Descend and appease your hunger with our bread and quench your thirst with our wine.
sentences.chinese: 下来用我们的面包充饥，用我们的葡萄酒解渴吧。

sentences.english: Desperate for nourishment, the troops stripped bark from the trees to eat and boiled up their leather belts.
sentences.chinese: 部队缺少营养，只能剥下树皮或煮皮带充饥。

sentences.english: They picked some favas to stay their hunger.
sentences.chinese: 他们摘了一些蚕豆充饥。

sentences.english: He wondered if it might be time to feed his precious bulbs to his children.
sentences.chinese: 他不知道是该把那些珍贵的郁金香球根给孩子们充饥。

sentences.english: Moreover, he is awfully hungry and wishes he could eat some of the food he is feeding the pigs.
sentences.chinese: 而且，他非常的饥饿，以至于想要以猪食充饥。

sentences.english: He giggled/chuckled and said, “This is called ‘ drawing a cake to satisfy one’s hunger’.”
sentences.chinese: 他咯咯的笑着说，“这叫做画饼充饥”。

sentences.english: He satisfied his hunger with a sandwich and milk.
sentences.chinese: 他以三明治和牛奶充饥。

sentences.english: Money can cure hunger, but it cannot cure unhappiness.
sentences.chinese: 金钱可以充饥，但不能治愈不幸。

sentences.english: Vau. And he hath broken my teeth one by one, he hath fed me with ashes.
sentences.chinese: 他用砂砾破碎我的牙齿，用灰尘给我充饥。

sentences.english: In emergencies, people too can eat the leaves to avoid starvation.
sentences.chinese: 甚至在一些严苛时刻，人们也可以食用树叶充饥。

sentences.english: When life was hard, people had to feed on blighted grains.
sentences.chinese: 生活艰苦的时候，人们只能靠秕谷充饥。

sentences.english: Can look at the family's website only, him feed on illusions.
sentences.chinese: 只能看着人家的网站，自己画饼充饥。

sentences.english: The idiom came from what the emperor said.
sentences.chinese: 成语“画饼充饥”就来自于皇帝所说的话。

definition: to feed to the full/to cram
beset by hunger and cold (idiom)/starving and freezing/in desperate poverty
